attributes.title: Terrible and SLOW
attributes.review: I got this app to support a cause and it does nothing it says in the description!! It took forever to open and it all costs money to open everything!!(99cents PER click) ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS, this is app should be taken down. I’m so furious $100 down the drain AND it charged me without consent 😡😡

attributes.title: no✨
attributes.review: This app was horrible. I downloaded it and it was glitchy and made my device go crazy! I had to restart my device. I just can’t live my life without giving this app a review that is honest. This experience has impacted my life forever. I lost some important photos of my pet gecko that died. 😢

attributes.title: Waste of Space
attributes.review: My eyes are open and have been opened to what type of president us Americans have. I am disappointed with his actions, his words, and the way he runs the country. And that’s the thing, he SHOULDN’T be running the country, WE should. Therefore I will NEVER support him OR the apps that were made to support him.

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: What an absolute joke of an app, it refused to work!! It has so many glitches in it , you can barely even get the app itself to turn on without it crashing on you! What a waste of time and space on my phone ! If I could do zero stars for this app I would!

attributes.title: 🤢 Bad app
attributes.review:
HORRIBLE app took days to download and when it finally did it gave my whole city a virus
I can’t imagine how people like this app 
I took hours to finally set up then I opened it and pictures of shrimps🍤 wouldn’t stop showing
I had to get a completely new phone just to write this review

attributes.title: Terrible!
attributes.review: First of all, it took days to fully download (I have plenty of storage too). Second of all, every time I try and open the app, it crashes and causes my phone to turn off! Do not get it! I can’t delete it, it won’t let me! It’s a virus! Someone take this off my phone!!

attributes.title: awful
attributes.review:
❤️no❤️
this app was absolutely awful, it took ages to download and then when i opened it, it played a awful sound and suddenly it restarted my phone and when it turned back on everything in my phone was deleted. i’m SO disappointed!!!

attributes.title: Worse App Ever
attributes.review: If I could give zero stars I totally would because this app is so horrible. I don’t even know why I downloaded it because honestly it’s giving me nothing but trouble since downloading it. Giving one star is more than I would give it at all because it is so bad.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APPPPPPP
attributes.review: Ok lets start at the beginning. So i was downloading the app, and it took forever like 2 months. Also when i opened the app it lagged and played the chicken wing song. Turns out that song was so loud it alerted the bees and now im running like Iida to avoid them. Horrible experience just for an app 😤 i don’t recommend for people.

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: this app took up all of my storage and it gave my phone a virus. I had to get a new phone and it got hacked because of this app. this app also made me do inappropriate things so I do not recommend! this app made me realize that we have a horrible president. #savebarron #blacklivesmatter #abolishice #saveyemen #trumpisapredator
